channel.title: [317][Soul Pkerz]What do the arguments in specialAtkNPC() mean?
channel.description:
The title's pretty self-explanatory.
I'm making custom special attacks, and I know the meaning of the second and fourth arguments, but not the first and third.
Example:
[code]specialAtkNPC(false, 25, 600, 2927);[/code]
Thanks,
d.v.c

item.title: [317][Soul Pkerz]What do the arguments in specialAtkNPC() mean?
item.dc:creator: @Dalcian Dalcian
item.description:
@Dalcian wrote:

Well, You could always just search it in client class and find the args, But i’m in a good mood so I’ll do it for you.

boolean hitTwice, int specDrain, int projectileHit, int emoteSet

Basically,

Hit twice.
spec drain
projectile hit
emote set.

Read full topic
item.source: [317][Soul Pkerz]What do the arguments in specialAtkNPC() mean?
